name: Daniel
description: Young exile who rose to advise kings. Interpreter of dreams, reader of writing on the wall. Faithful in Babylon, untouched in the lions' den.

lions-den.name: In the Lions' Den
lions-den.prompt: standing calm among lions in pit - lions peaceful around him, angel's presence implied, faith that shut the mouths of beasts

interpreting-dream.name: Interpreting the Dream
interpreting-dream.prompt: standing before great king explaining dream - gesturing as he reveals meaning of statue, young exile with wisdom of ages, gift that elevated him

reading-wall.name: Reading the Writing
reading-wall.description: Interpreting the writing on the wall
reading-wall.prompt: pointing to mysterious writing on wall - MENE MENE TEKEL UPHARSIN glowing, fearless before doomed king, speaking judgment without trembling

refusing-food.name: The First Stand
refusing-food.description: Young Daniel refusing the king's food
refusing-food.prompt: young man politely refusing royal delicacies - choosing vegetables over compromise, first test of faith, conviction before promotion

praying-toward-jerusalem.name: Praying Despite the Decree
praying-toward-jerusalem.prompt: kneeling at window facing Jerusalem - praying openly though forbidden, window open for all to see, faithfulness that invited death

receiving-vision.name: Receiving the Vision
receiving-vision.prompt: fallen to ground as vision overwhelms - seeing beasts and kingdoms, future history revealed, weight of revelation pressing down
